data.title: Astrometry.net: Astrometric calibration of images
data.name: astrometry.net
data.description: Astrometry.net -- automatic recognition of astronomical images

evidence: README container command: "docker run --volume "$(pwd):$(pwd)" -w "$(pwd)" astrometrynet/solver:0.98 solve-field image.jpg"
"Automatic recognition of astronomical images; or standards-compliant astrometric metadata from data."

"If you have astronomical imaging of the sky with celestial coordinates you do not know—or do not trust—then Astrometry.net is for you. Input an image and we'll give you back astrometric calibration meta-data"
